security_audit.summary: All 64 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES. This is a legitimate content verification tool using standard JavaScript patterns. Template literals (backticks) were misidentified as shell backticks, standard file operations as filesystem risks, and string manipulation as weak cryptography. No shell execution, path traversal exploits, credential exfiltration, or malicious behavior present. The code reads markdown files, calls Anthropic API for analysis, and writes results locally.

content.user_title: Verify viral potential of content with AI analysis
content.value_statement: Content often fails to gain traction because it lacks key viral elements. This skill uses AI to score your content on curiosity gaps, emotional triggers, and storytelling impact, then rewrites it for maximum engagement.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes content against 6 key viral factors including curiosity gap, emotional resonance, and pacing
Scores content on viral potential with detailed 0-100 rating scale and factor breakdown
Identifies specific weaknesses and provides targeted improvement suggestions
Rewrites content using Defou x Stanley style for maximum viral impact
Supports batch processing of multiple files from source directory
Generates comprehensive Markdown verification reports with scorecards
limitations: Requires Anthropic API key for AI analysis features
Currently optimized for short-form content like tweets and social posts
Cannot verify content that requires real-time data or current events
Output quality depends on input content quality and length

use_cases.title: Optimize post performance
use_cases.description: Transform average social posts into high-engagement viral content with AI-powered scoring and rewriting.

use_cases.title: Validate content strategy
use_cases.description: Run existing content through viral verification before publishing to maximize reach and engagement metrics.

use_cases.title: Enhance headline impact
use_cases.description: Analyze and rewrite newsletter openers and hooks to improve click-through rates and subscriber engagement.

prompt_templates.title: Rewrite Request

prompt_templates.title: Factor Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Run viral-verification with detailed analysis of all 6 viral factors with specific examples.

output_examples.input: Check if this tweet is viral-ready: Great tips on productivity. Check out our blog for more.
output: Weaknesses: Lacks curiosity gap, no emotional trigger, generic opening
Recommendations: Add specific number, create urgency, include personal angle
Rewritten: I tested 5 productivity systems for 30 days. Only 1 doubled my output. Here is the surprising winner...

output_examples.input: Analyze this newsletter opener: Why Most Startup Ideas Fail (And How to Avoid It)
output: Strengths: Strong curiosity gap, clear promise of value
Weaknesses: Common framing, lacks specificity, no personal angle
Recommendations: Add specific failure percentage, include brief personal story
Rewritten: 9 out of 10 startups fail. I watched 47 crash. Here is the one pattern that separated the survivors...

best_practices: Provide complete content including title and body for accurate viral scoring
Use the rewritten output as a starting point and add your own voice
Run multiple variations through verification to compare scores before publishing
Review the detailed factor analysis to understand why content scored as it did
anti_patterns: Do not rely solely on viral score without reading the detailed analysis
Avoid using the skill without an Anthropic API key configured
Do not skip the improvement suggestions - they contain actionable advice
Avoid testing very short content under 50 words as scoring may be unreliable

faq.question: What viral factors does this skill analyze?
faq.answer: Six key factors: curiosity gap, emotional resonance, value/utility, timeliness, storytelling pacing, and novelty.

faq.question: What does the viral score mean?
faq.answer: A 0-100 score where 70+ indicates strong viral potential, 40-60 needs improvement, below 40 requires rewriting.

faq.question: Can I use this for long-form content?
faq.answer: It works best on short-form content like tweets and posts. Long-form content may receive less detailed analysis.

faq.question: How long does verification take?
faq.answer: Each file takes 10-30 seconds. Batch processing runs concurrently at 2 files at a time.

faq.question: What is the Defou x Stanley style?
faq.answer: A minimalist, sharp writing style with strong hooks, short sentences, and high insight density.

faq.question: Do I need API credentials?
faq.answer: Yes, an Anthropic API key is required. Set ANTHROPIC_API_KEY in your environment variables.
